heading: Sample Markdown Data
markdown_content:
# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### Heading 4
##### Heading 5
###### Heading 6  

---

## Paragraphs and Line Breaks
This is a paragraph of text.  
Here is the second line in the same paragraph.  
This line uses two spaces at the end for a line break.  

Another paragraph starts here.

---

## Emphasis
- *Italic text*  
- **Bold text**  
- ***Bold and Italic***  
- ~~Strikethrough~~  
- ==Highlighted text== (if your renderer supports it)  
- <u>Underlined</u> (using raw HTML)

---

## Blockquotes
> This is a blockquote.  
> It can span multiple lines.  
>> Nested blockquote level 2  
>>> Nested blockquote level 3  

---

## Lists

### Unordered List
- Item 1  
- Item 2  
  - Subitem 2.1  
  - Subitem 2.2  
- Item 3  

### Ordered List
1. Step One  
2. Step Two  
   1. Substep 2.1  
   2. Substep 2.2  
3. Step Three  

### Task List
- [x] Completed task  
- [ ] Incomplete task  
- [ ] Another task  

### Definition List (Markdown Extra / GFM)
Term 1  
: Definition of term 1  
Term 2  
: Definition of term 2  

---

## Code

### Inline Code
Use the `print("Hello")` command in Python.  

### Fenced Code Block
```python
def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}"

print(greet("World"))
```

### Indented Code Block
    SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = 1;  

---

## Links
- [Inline link](https://example.com)  
- [Inline link with title](https://example.com "Example Site")  
- [Reference link][id]  
- Autolink: <https://example.com>  

[id]: https://example.com  

---

## Images
![Alt text](https://via.placeholder.com/150 "Optional title")  

---

## Tables
| Name     | Age | Role      |  
|----------|-----|-----------|  
| Alice    | 25  | Developer |  
| Bob      | 30  | Designer  |  
| Charlie  | 35  | Manager   |  

---

## Horizontal Rule
---

## Footnotes
Here is a statement with a footnote.[^1]  

[^1]: This is the footnote definition.  

---

## Emoji (if supported)
ðŸ˜ƒ ðŸš€ âœ… ðŸ’¡  

---

## Math (if supported with MathJax / KaTeX)
Inline math: $E = mc^2$  

Block math:  

$$
\int_0^\infty e^{-x} \, dx = 1
$$
